Reason: The _journalSerializer configuration is performance-sensitive. The configuration directly affects the performance of the system at the system level by determining how journal serialization is handled in the Prevayler system. The journalSerializer() method is crucial in providing the Serializer object for serialization purposes. Depending on the chosen serializer, it can have a significant impact on the performance and efficiency of the system. Therefore, the configuration involves performance-related operations that are time-expensive and memory-expensive, leading to notable performance variations at the system level.
